attributes.action: Make St Georges Day 2009 a national day of celebration with full Government support and country wide promotion and coverage for the English people who reside in it, many of whom who are proud to call themselves English and not British.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a very proud Englishwoman I was very disappointed with the lack of interest in the celebration of St. Georges Day 2008 and as the governments recent confession shows regarding spending for the event there is today a serious lack of priority for this celebration. In 2009 and henceforth I would like to see more patriotism and a greater understanding that we English should be allowed and encouraged to celebrate the fact that we are English within our own country with more government support and promotion. .   

Please sign the petition if you feel as strongly as I do about this matter.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
